Text: I posted the newst album earlier today along with the collection of EP's I have ... PURESSENCE are legendary .... seen them 5 times live .... ENJOY!!!!

Th guy who is leeching them from Manchester throw me an email @ petermesh@hotmail.com

I'd say this band is one of the most underrated band of all time!

Thanks for sharing Peter!
